attributes.action: Close early years and nursery settings in line with school closures
attributes.additional_details: Schools are to close due to the transmission of covid and its new strain. Why are nurseries any different. They are surely more susceptible to transmitting the virus, due to social distancing being non existent in early years and nursery settings.
attributes.background: Close early years and nursery settings in line with school closures.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566718
